user_question: How can I build a robot that can sort different colored balls and generate a design image of the robot?
final_answer: To build a robot that can sort different colored balls, you need a camera for color detection, a microcontroller for processing, and actuators for movement. Image of the robot design generated. Python and C++ are commonly used programming languages for microcontrollers in robotics.
